alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 6:42PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Box Elder and northwestern Tooele Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 641 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near West Wendover to 7 miles east of Wendover to 15 miles south of Utah Test and Training Range South. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wendover, Utah Test and Training Range South and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 0 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
